org.resthub.oauth2.filter.front
Class SecuredHttpRequest

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.ServletRequestWrapper
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper
          org.resthub.oauth2.filter.front.SecuredHttpRequest
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.ServletRequest
public class SecuredHttpRequest
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper

This wrapper allows the OAuth 2 filter to enrich the request with the user informations.

The following token informations are available :

  • userId - set as "Principal"
  • permissions - set as "roles"
